TopicTitle: Squadcast Summary (2015-03-28) - Back With A Bang Edition!

Articles.Content:
> 
> Ice Cream ISRU?
> MintIceCream -> O2
> 
> VanillaIceCream -> Water
> 
> ChocolateIceCream -> Food
> 
> RedBeanIceCream -> LFO
> 
> RockyRoadIceCream -> Rocketparts
> 
> PistachioIceCream -> SolidFuel
> 
> GrapeSherbertIceCream->XenonGas

That looks great!

Although I think a more common ice cream flavor might be better for LFO.

> 
> That looks great!
> Although I think a more common ice cream flavor might be better for LFO.

Coffee ice cream. Coffee is basically liquid fuel for people, soooo... =P

> 
> Someone pointed out to me that Val looks like the babysitter off the incredibles.

...

God damn it.

AREEHHHH, i keep getting the Vals mixed up! I at first thought that you meant the moon Val looks like the Incredibles baby sitter. I read it three times before i realized you meant Valentina. Can we have a different short name for Valentina?

Ore? I would have been happy with just "Stuff".

*"Bill, the scanner indicates that we are over a rich deposit of Stuff." "Excellent, Bob - Jebediah, take us down..."*

> 
> Can we have a different short name for Valentina?

Vall != Val. Former is the moon, latter is the kerbal.

> 
> Coffee ice cream. Coffee is basically liquid fuel for people, soooo... =P

I was figuring beans for..well...byproducts of biological reactions, but coffee works too.

KAS container IceCreamKart, not storable

Can carry 20 units of each flavor.

Has special Scoop command that slowly gathers nearby flavors

When attached to proper storage, can slowly and inefficiently convert outputs

IceCreamTruck

Medium storage with faster mining and faster processing (has a small backhoe bucket)

IceCreamShoppe

Large storage for inputs and outputs, much faster mining and much more efficient processsing (has a bulldozer scoop).

I did NOT spend all morning at work dreaming this up, along with potential models. Nope, not at all.
One question guys: Next SC should be in the next hours right?

> 
> Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Can we have a different short name for Valentina?

Tina?
